item.title: Cartel boss "El Mayo" Zambada Garcia pleads guilty to U.S. drug trafficking charges
item.description: Ex-Mexican cartel leader Ismael "El Mayo" Zambada Garcia pleaded guilty Monday to federal charges related to his role as a co-founder of the Sinaloa C...

item.title: Grandma's craft store sees influx of customers after viral Facebook marketplace post
item.description: A grandma's quiet craft shop in Holdingford, Minnesota, got a big surprise thanks to her loving grandson and a viral Facebook post.

item.title: North Texas nonprofit transforms lives by bringing technology to the blind

item.title: Detroit Lions to induct Robert Porcher into Pride of the Lions
item.description: Porcher will be inducted into the Pride of the Lions during halftime of the team's homecoming game and home opener on Sept. 14.

item.title: House Oversight Committee subpoenas Jeffrey Epstein's estate
item.description: House Oversight Committee Chairman James Comer subpoenaed estate of Jeffrey Epstein, seeking over a dozen categories of documents.
